purpose: Retrieves a simulation slot record from IndexedDB for a given project and slot index

Retrieves all world relationships belonging to a simulation run from IndexedDB, stripping internal run ID fields

Renders the world-explorer filter sidebar where users adjust tag, relationship, prominence, and tick filters alongside view mode controls
